resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: Runge was a correspondent of Johann Wolfgang van Goethe who published his book Farbenlehre (Theory of Colors)  outlining his psychology of color the same year.
resource.chars: Runge was a correspondent of Johann Wolfgang van Goethe who published his book Farbenlehre (Theory of Colors)  outlining his psychology of color the same year.
